title: Pesticide Storage | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Managing chemical storage on land properties
subtasks: Limiting access to chemicals for humans, especially youth
Focusing on the label to determine chemical toxicity, usage, and storage
Storing chemicals by category (e.g., insecticides and herbicides separately)
Keeping all chemicals in their original containers
Avoiding the use of food containers for storing chemicals
Proper storage of personal protective equipment (gloves, glasses) separately
